product_name: The North Face Shellista Lace Boots - Girls'
long_description: The waterproof Shellista Lace boots from The North Face keep your little girl's feet warm and dry while she builds a snowman or helps shovel the sidewalk on a cold winter day. Waterproof suede/leather uppers combine with mesh panels treated with a Durable Water Repellent for added weather resistance. Waterproof thermoplastic rubber shell bottoms provide durable protection where most elements are met. 200g Heatseeker(TM) insulation throughout offers warmth in conditions down to about -25degF. Faux fur collars add a touch of style and help keep snow out of boots. EVA midsoles in The North Face Shellista Lace boots provide cushioning against shock. Nylon shanks offer torsional stability for trekking on uneven ground. Thermoplastic rubber outsoles supply good traction in wet, slick conditions.
short_description: The waterproof Shellista Lace boots from The North Face keep your little girl's feet warm and dry while she builds a snowman or helps shovel the sidewalk on a cold winter day.
